channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Huge branch snapped off tree and is blocking alley, 23rd June
item.description:
There is a large tree in the alley between Norfolk Crescent and Berwick Crescent. I was told me that the tree was originally in someone’s garden but they didn’t want it so they moved their boundary in, hence tree is in alley. A huge branch snapped of this tree on Friday evening. It is currently resting partly on someone’s shed. It’s blocking the alley and the tree could move at any time. I also think that the main part of the tree is dead or half dead as it hasn’t had any leaves on it this spring/summer.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 183, Norfolk Crescent, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytip. Incl ripped bag with cooked rice and a warning label, 23rd June
item.description:
Please see pics. Usual flytipping spot penge High street and with bag of Cooked rice spilling out of ripped bag. Includes a sticker from PCS management (!) saying too heavy to lift as over 3kg. Arrived last night as with the other bags! Please sort as this food will encourage vermin Location for ref only : very near restaurant up from houses 83 high street

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Narrow pavement obstucted by Trees/grass, 23rd June
item.description:
The payement/shrubs need clearing on both sides especially along the bit by the roman ruins. I had to step on the road to get around a bit this morning and as Poverest Road is VERY busy and is used by many pedestrians this needs to be done urgently. The roman ruins side is very narrow.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Poverest Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
